translated: It eliminates non-knowledge with regard to all phenomena because it makes all phenomena of one taste with emptiness.

original: chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa ni chos rnams thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid du dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa ni chos rnams thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid du dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is without reference to all phenomena because it does not refer to all phenomena as being the nature of affliction and purification.

original: me tog bkram pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me tog bkram pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The spreading of flowers is the application of the flowers of the factors of enlightenment.

original: chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po sgrub pa ni chos rnams thams cad kyi dngos po nyid kyis mngon par shes pa la sgos pa'i don sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po sgrub pa ni chos rnams thams cad kyi dngos po nyid kyis mngon par shes pa la sgos pa'i don sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The accomplishment of the nature of all phenomena is the accomplishment of the meaning of the superknowledges through the nature of all phenomena.

original: sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa'i thugs rjes ji lta ba bzhin la dgongs nas tha snyad du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa'i thugs rjes ji lta ba bzhin la dgongs nas tha snyad du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because the conventional is made by the compassionate one who has abandoned illusion, intending the suchness.

original: me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba bsgrub pa ni me long gi dkyil 'khor la snang ba bzhin gyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la sogs pa mngon par sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba bsgrub pa ni me long gi dkyil 'khor la snang ba bzhin gyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la sogs pa mngon par sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The accomplishment of the appearance in the circle of the mirror is the accomplishment of the enjoyment body, etc. as if it were an appearance in the circle of a mirror.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa ni sems can rnams la phan pa nye bar sgrub pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa ni sems can rnams la phan pa nye bar sgrub pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The accomplishment of the sound of all sentient beings is the accomplishment of the sound of all sentient beings with the intention of accomplishing the welfare of sentient beings.

original: rdul dang bral ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rdul yang dag par spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdul dang bral ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rdul yang dag par spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Free from dust means that he has completely abandoned the dust of passion, etc.

original: sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las nges par thar nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba thob par byed pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgzhung kha cig las ni sems can tham @216a * //
analyzed: sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las nges par thar nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba thob par byed pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir ro // gzhung kha cig las ni sems can tham @216a * //
translated: He delights all sentient beings means that he teaches the Dharma to liberate all sentient beings from the suffering of cyclic existence and to cause them to attain the bliss of perfect enlightenment.

original: cad mngon par sgrol zhes zer ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: cad mngon par sgrol zhes zer ba ni go sla'o //
translated: In some texts, it says that he liberates all sentient beings, which is easy to understand.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba ni sems can thams cad la chos ston pa'i kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus la sogs pa'i las kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba ni sems can thams cad la chos ston pa'i kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus la sogs pa'i las kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba'o //
translated: He has attained skill in the sounds of all sentient beings means that he has attained skill in the means of the actions of body, etc. that are irreproachable in teaching the Dharma to all sentient beings.

original: sgra dang tshig 'bru sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa ni sgra sna tshogs pa dang / tshig dang 'bru rnams kyis stong pa nyid du ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra dang tshig 'bru sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa ni sgra sna tshogs pa dang / tshig dang 'bru rnams kyis stong pa nyid du ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He has accomplished the various sounds, words, and letters means that he teaches emptiness by means of the various sounds, words, and letters.

original: khengs pa med pa ni /
analyzed: khengs pa med pa ni /
translated: Absence of pride isüîΩthe absence of confusion about the practice of the emptiness of form, etc.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid las sgrub pa la kun du rmongs pa med pa'i phyir dang / de ston pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du tha snyad med de /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid las sgrub pa la kun du rmongs pa med pa'i phyir dang / de ston pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du tha snyad med de /
translated: It is not a conventional designation for the individual correct knowledges that teach that, because it is not the nature of the knowledge of form, etc.

original: mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa'i rang bzhin dang gang zag la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i tha snyad du byar med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa'i rang bzhin dang gang zag la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i tha snyad du byar med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not a conventional designation for the person, etc., because it is not the nature of the knowledge of the person, etc.

original: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bdag la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bdag la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'o //
translated: Attainment of the liberation free from obscurations is freedom from the obscurations of the characteristics of self, etc., in all world-realms.

original: rdul dang bral ba ni stong pa nyid la yang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdul dang bral ba ni stong pa nyid la yang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Freedom from dust is the absence of strong attachment to emptiness, etc.

original: ming dang nges pa'i tshig dang yig 'bru ni ming ni brda la bsam pas rjes su rtogs pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa ni tshig rnams sam dus la sogs pa'i yig 'brus rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ming dang nges pa'i tshig dang yig 'bru ni ming ni brda la bsam pas rjes su rtogs pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa ni tshig rnams sam dus la sogs pa'i yig 'brus rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Name, verbal description, and letters are the name, the verbal description, and the letters of generosity, etc.

original: chos thams cad la lhag mthong ni 'dus byas pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad la lhag mthong ni 'dus byas pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Insight into all things is seeing them as free from the characteristics of the compounded.

original: chos thams cad yul dang bral ba ni chos rnams thams cad kyi yul la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis su yod pa nyid la sogs pa'i phyir ci log tu mi mthong ste /üîΩchos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid du ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad yul dang bral ba ni chos rnams thams cad kyi yul la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis su yod pa nyid la sogs pa'i phyir ci log tu mi mthong ste / chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid du ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The absence of the domain of all things is the non-perception of the domain of all things as a duality, i.e. as the apprehended object and the apprehending subject, etc.üîΩThe absence of the domain of all things is the non-perception of the domain of all things as a duality, i.e. as the apprehended object and the apprehending subject, etc.

original: chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' ni 'dus ma byas pa rnams su yang mtshan mar mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' ni 'dus ma byas pa rnams su yang mtshan mar mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The absence of obscuration in regard to all things is the non-apprehension of the uncompounded as a sign.

original: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ni chos rnams thams cad la stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ni chos rnams thams cad la stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Like space means that all phenomena are realized to be the same as space, which is of one taste with emptiness.

original: rdo rje lta bu ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa la rtse gcig pa nyid kyis te /
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa la rtse gcig pa nyid kyis te /
translated: Like a vajra means that all phenomena are focused on emptiness, and so are one-pointed.

original: sgrib pa thams cad kyi dben pa po nyid kyis ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad kyi dben pa po nyid kyis ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Since it is isolated from all obscurations, it is like a vajra.

original: gzugs kyi rdul sel ba ni gzugs kyi rdul bsal ba'i mtshan dang dpe byed kyis 'bar ba'i gzugs @216b kyi sku ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rdul sel ba ni gzugs kyi rdul bsal ba'i mtshan dang dpe byed kyis 'bar ba'i gzugs @216b kyi sku ste /
translated: The removal of the dust of form means that the form body blazes with the major and minor marks that remove the dust of form.

original: gang yang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: gang yang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: It also has the characteristics of the enjoyment body and the emanation body.

original: phun sum tshogs pas mdzes par byas pa ni phun sum tshogs pa'i mi mthun phyogs kyis gang zag dang chos su sgro 'dogs pa de la med pas phun sum tshogs pas mdzes pa ste /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pas mdzes par byas pa ni phun sum tshogs pa'i mi mthun phyogs kyis gang zag dang chos su sgro 'dogs pa de la med pas phun sum tshogs pas mdzes pa ste /
translated: Adorned with perfection means that it is adorned with perfection because it is free from the imputation of persons and phenomena, which are the opposites of perfection.

original: gnyi ga bdag med pa'i dri ma med pas mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga bdag med pa'i dri ma med pas mdzes pa'o //
translated: It is adorned with stainlessness because it is free from the stains of the selflessness of both.

original: rgyal ba thob pa ni mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis yang dag pa'i chos rnams thams cad stong pas sems can gyi don dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyal ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyal ba thob pa ni mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis yang dag pa'i chos rnams thams cad stong pas sems can gyi don dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyal ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The attainment of the Conqueror is the attainment of the Conqueror in accordance with the welfare of sentient beings, because of the emptiness of all things through signlessness.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i mig rnam pa thams cad kyi chos sgrub pa'i mig la bar chad med pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i mig rnam pa thams cad kyi chos sgrub pa'i mig la bar chad med pa'i phyir ro//
translated: The eye of irreversibility is the eye of the accomplishment of all aspects of the Dharma, because of the absence of obstacles.

original: chos kyi dbyings su nges pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid la the tshom gyi phyin ci log dang bral ba'i phyir nges pa brtan pos kun du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su nges pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid la the tshom gyi phyin ci log dang bral ba'i phyir nges pa brtan pos kun du gnas pa'o //
translated: The ascertainment of the dharma-dhƒÅtu is the firm ascertainment of the nature of the dharma-dhƒÅtu, because of being free from the error of doubt.

original: chos kyi dbyings su nges par 'byung ba ni thugs rje chen pos bsgom pa rnams kyi chos rnams thams cad chos kyi dbyings mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su nges par 'byung ba ni thugs rje chen pos bsgom pa rnams kyi chos rnams thams cad chos kyi dbyings mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The emergence of the ascertainment of the dharma-dhƒÅtu is the ascertainment of all things of those who cultivate great compassion through the signlessness of the dharma-dhƒÅtu.

original: dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan ma'i gnyen po nyid kyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan ma'i gnyen po nyid kyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The gift of relief is the gift of the relief of attaining nonabiding nirvana, since it is the antidote to the sign of nirvana.

original: seng ge mngon par sgrogs pa ni rang dang gzhan gyi bya ba'i yang dag pa'i don la lus la sogs pa rtse gcig pas sbyor bas bstan pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs rnams su skrag pa dang bral ba nyid kyis seng ge bzhin du mngon par sgrogs pa'i
analyzed: seng ge mngon par sgrogs pa ni rang dang gzhan gyi bya ba'i yang dag pa'i don la lus la sogs pa rtse gcig pas sbyor bas bstan pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs rnams su skrag pa dang bral ba nyid kyis seng ge bzhin du mngon par sgrogs pa'i
translated: The lion's roar is the roar of the lion, free from fear, in all situations such as teaching, through the one pointed application of body and so on to the true meaning of one's own and others' aims.

original: phyir ro // sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa ni chos thams cad yongs su mi 'dzin pas bdud la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir ro // sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa ni chos thams cad yongs su mi 'dzin pas bdud la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subjugating all sentient beings is subjugating all sentient beings such as demons through not grasping any phenomena.

original: rdul dang bral ba ni byang chub kyi sems la nga rgyal la sogs pa'i rdul dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdul dang bral ba ni byang chub kyi sems la nga rgyal la sogs pa'i rdul dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Free from dust is free from the dust of pride and so on with regard to the mind of enlightenment.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni ming la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni ming la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Absence of defilement is because of the absence of defilement due to attachment to names, etc.

original: padma bkod pa ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos rnams thams cad la bsam pa dang bral ba nyid kyis yongs su longs spyod kyang nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir padma la chus bzhin no //
analyzed: padma bkod pa ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos rnams thams cad la bsam pa dang bral ba nyid kyis yongs su longs spyod kyang nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir padma la chus bzhin no //
translated: Lotus-array is because of the enjoyment of all things which are pure by nature, without any intention, like a lotus unaffected by the water.

original: nem nur gcod pa ni chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid sgrub pa la thams cad du 'gro ba'i nem nur bzlog pa'i @217a * //
analyzed: nem nur gcod pa ni chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid sgrub pa la thams cad du 'gro ba'i nem nur bzlog pa'i @217a * //
translated: Cutting off doubt is because of the elimination of all doubt concerning the attainment of the reality of all things.

original: phyir ro // snying po thams cad kyi rjes su son pa ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i snying po'i rjes su son pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir ro // snying po thams cad kyi rjes su son pa ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i snying po'i rjes su son pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Reaching the essence of all is because of reaching the essence of the purity of the thought of enlightenment, etc.

original: chos thams cad la mngon par 'phags pa chos thams cad la yod pa nyid la sogs pa brtags pa rnams par dag pa'i byams pa la sogs pa'i tshad med pa rnams kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad la mngon par 'phags pa chos thams cad la yod pa nyid la sogs pa brtags pa rnams par dag pa'i byams pa la sogs pa'i tshad med pa rnams kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is superior because of the immeasurable loving kindness and so on, which are purified by the investigation of the existence of all phenomena and so on.

original: mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa thob pa ni chos rnams thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa thob pa ni chos rnams thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus so //
translated: The attainment of the superknowledges, powers, fearlessnesses, and so on is by the power of the concentration of the nonapprehension of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad nges par 'bigs pa ni chos kyi dbyings so sor 'bigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad nges par 'bigs pa ni chos kyi dbyings so sor 'bigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The penetration of all phenomena is the penetration of the realm of phenomena.

original: chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa'i rgya mtsho ni bla na med pa'i gzhi ste mthong ba las rnam par log pa kun du 'dzin pa ni nyid kyis de rgya mtshor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa'i rgya mtsho ni bla na med pa'i gzhi ste mthong ba las rnam par log pa kun du 'dzin pa ni nyid kyis de rgya mtshor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The ocean of the wealth of all phenomena is the unsurpassed ground, and the holding of the reversal of seeing is the holding of that as an ocean.

original: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni chos thams cad kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams kyis 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni chos thams cad kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams kyis 'byor pa ste /
translated: The seal of all phenomena is the wealth of the aggregates and so on of all phenomena.

original: srid pa dang zhi bar mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa des rgyas btab pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang dga' ba 'byin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa dang zhi bar mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa des rgyas btab pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang dga' ba 'byin par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the seal of the bliss and joy of perfect enlightenment, because it is the seal of the nirvana that does not dwell in either existence or in peace.

original: 'byor ba ni bden pa ma yin pa sgro btags pa dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid de nyid yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi ngo bo'i chos rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'byor ba ni bden pa ma yin pa sgro btags pa dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid de nyid yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi ngo bo'i chos rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mastery is the emptiness that is free from the superimposition of the unreal, and it is the seal of all phenomena that are the essence of the correct relative.

original: chos thams cad la khyad par med par ston pa ni chos rnams thams cad la gang zag gi bdag med par mnyam par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad la khyad par med par ston pa ni chos rnams thams cad la gang zag gi bdag med par mnyam par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The teaching of the absence of distinction in all phenomena is because of the realization of the equality of the absence of the self of persons in all phenomena.

original: lta bar 'gyur ba'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spangs pa ni /
analyzed: lta bar 'gyur ba'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spangs pa ni /
translated: The complete abandonment of all the thickets of views is

original: rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa'i lta ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa'i lta ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of being free from the views of eternalism, nihilism, and so on.

original: mun pa dang bral ba ni brtags pa thams cad kyi mun pa dang 'dres pa bcom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mun pa dang bral ba ni brtags pa thams cad kyi mun pa dang 'dres pa bcom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The absence of darkness is because of destroying the darkness that is mixed with all the imputations.

original: chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba ni chos rnams thams cad la mtshan mar sgro btags pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba ni chos rnams thams cad la mtshan mar sgro btags pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is free from the signs of all phenomena, because it is free from the superimposition of signs on all phenomena.

original: chags pa thams cad las grol ba ni phyi dang nang gi chos rnams thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa thams cad las grol ba ni phyi dang nang gi chos rnams thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is free from all attachments, because it engages in generosity and so forth without attachment to any internal or external phenomena.

original: le lo thams cad dang bral ba ni gnas skabs thams cad du gzhan gyi don bya ba brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: le lo thams cad dang bral ba ni gnas skabs thams cad du gzhan gyi don bya ba brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is free from all laziness, because it is the undertaking of effort to act for the welfare of others in all situations.

original: chos zab mo 'od byed pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gdul bar bya ba rnams la 'od byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos zab mo 'od byed pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gdul bar bya ba rnams la 'od byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the illumination of the profound Dharma, because it illuminates all phenomena with emptiness for those to be trained.

original: ri rab 'dra ba ni spros pa med pa'i shes rab kyis ma g-yos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ri rab 'dra ba ni spros pa med pa'i shes rab kyis ma g-yos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is like Mount Meru, because it is unshaken by the wisdom free from conceptual elaboration.

original: mi @217b 'phrogs pa'i kun du bzang po'i dngos po rnams las rnam par mi ldog pa'o //
analyzed: mi @217b 'phrogs pa'i kun du bzang po'i dngos po rnams las rnam par mi ldog pa'o //
translated: It is the unassailable state of universal excellence, because it does not turn away from things.

original: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa ni stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i phyir 'dod pa kun la longs spyod kyang zhen pa dang bral bas bdud thams cad rnam par bcom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa ni stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i phyir 'dod pa kun la longs spyod kyang zhen pa dang bral bas bdud thams cad rnam par bcom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mandala of demons is destroyed because of being of one taste with emptiness, since one enjoys all desires but is free from attachment, one destroys all demons.

original: 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma zhen pa ni spros pa med pa'i shes rab mngon du byas pas mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma zhen pa ni spros pa med pa'i shes rab mngon du byas pas mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The three worlds are not clung to because of manifesting nonconceptual wisdom, since one abandons clinging.

original: 'od zer sgrub pa ni ma lus pa'i brtags pa'i rtog pas ma gos pa nyid kyis thams cad du bsal ba'i shes rab kyi 'od zer bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od zer sgrub pa ni ma lus pa'i brtags pa'i rtog pas ma gos pa nyid kyis thams cad du bsal ba'i shes rab kyi 'od zer bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The light rays are accomplished because of accomplishing the light rays of wisdom that illuminate everything, since one is unstained by the conceptual thoughts of the entire imagined.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi sku mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi sku mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The tathagatas are seen because of seeing the tathagata‚Äôs suchness, the dharmakaya.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes rab kyis ma lus pa'i rang dang gzhan dag la yongs su gsal bar byed pas kun du rmongs pa thams cad dang bral nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i gnas su
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i shes rab kyis ma lus pa'i rang dang gzhan dag la yongs su gsal bar byed pas kun du rmongs pa thams cad dang bral nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i gnas su
translated: Seeing all tathƒÅgatas is seeing the tathƒÅgatas and so on through the uncommon wisdom that illuminates oneself and others without exception, free from all confusion.üîΩ

original: gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Seeing all tathagatas is seeing the tathagatas and so on, because it is the state of seeing the tathagatas and so on, free from all confusion, since it illuminates all of oneself and others without exception through uncommon wisdom.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di rnams la drug cu rtsa gnyis nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di rnams la drug cu rtsa gnyis nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: These samadhis are illustrated by sixty two,

original: grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams te /
analyzed: grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams te /
translated: but they are innumerable samadhis.

original: ting nge 'dzin de rnams yang mos pas spyod pa'i sa kun du spyod pa na 'phags pa chos 'phags kyi byin gyi rlabs dang rang gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs las skyes pas rmi lam gyi gnas skabs bzhin du dus de ji srid du mthong ba'o
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de rnams yang mos pas spyod pa'i sa kun du spyod pa na 'phags pa chos 'phags kyi byin gyi rlabs dang rang gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs las skyes pas rmi lam gyi gnas skabs bzhin du dus de ji srid du mthong ba'o
translated: When bodhisattvas practice those samadhis on the level of earnest aspiration, they see them for as long as that period lasts, like a dream state, through the blessings of noble Dharmodgata and through the power of their own merit and wisdom.

original: // gang yang dkon mchog sprin las mos pas spyod pa'i sa las grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams rtogs par bshad pa de yang dus de srid du kho nar ro //
analyzed: // gang yang dkon mchog sprin las mos pas spyod pa'i sa las grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams rtogs par bshad pa de yang dus de srid du kho nar ro //
translated: Also, the passage from the Cloud of Jewels Satra that explains the realization of the innumerable concentrations on the stage of action through faith is also for that length of time.

original: thams cad du yang ting nge 'dzin rnams rgyun du mthong ba ni kha cig rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa rnams la ste /
analyzed: thams cad du yang ting nge 'dzin rnams rgyun du mthong ba ni kha cig rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa rnams la ste /
translated: And in all cases, the continuous perception of concentrations is on the stages of the Joyous, etc.

original: rnam pa thams cad nas thams cad du ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis sangs rgyas kyi sa la ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad nas thams cad du ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis sangs rgyas kyi sa la ste /
translated: In all ways, the stage of Buddhahood is attained in three periods of innumerable aeons.

original: thabs la mkhas pa ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa la yang grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dus de srid du mthong ba'o //
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa la yang grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dus de srid du mthong ba'o //
translated: Skill in means is the perception of innumerable concentrations for that length of time on the stage of the Joyous.

original: gang 'dir 'di dag gis bstan par rab tu mthong ba de nyid na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa'i thal 'gyur de ni yid 'phrog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang 'dir 'di dag gis bstan par rab tu mthong ba de nyid na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa'i thal 'gyur de ni yid 'phrog pa ma yin te /
translated: The reductio argument that this is the attainment of Buddhahood is not convincing.

original: gal te thabs la mkhas pas thams cad du mthong bar gyur kyang de rnams kyi de lta na yang bsgom pa'i lam gyi rab tu spang bar bya ba'i dri ma rnams kyis gsal @218a * //
analyzed: gal te thabs la mkhas pas thams cad du mthong bar gyur kyang de rnams kyi de lta na yang bsgom pa'i lam gyi rab tu spang bar bya ba'i dri ma rnams kyis gsal @218a * //
translated: If one sees everything through skill in means, one is not sullied by the stains of samsara.üîΩ

original: ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang shin tu ring du 'phro ba'i rab kyi mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir na de nyid du sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //üîΩde de rnams la zhes pa ni de mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas par byed pa ni 'di rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rim gyis skye ba rnams la gnas shing /
analyzed: ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang shin tu ring du 'phro ba'i rab kyi mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir na de nyid du sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba ni ma yin no // de de rnams la zhes pa ni de mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas par byed pa ni 'di rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rim gyis skye ba rnams la gnas shing /
translated: Even though they see everything through skill in means, they do not become buddhas right then, because the stains to be abandoned on the path of meditation are not yet clear and they have not reached the limit of the most distant extension.üîΩThey abide in those, etc.

original: ting nge 'dzin gzhan gyi yon tan sngon gyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su ma btang ba las skyes la /üîΩphyogs bcu'i 'dir zhes pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gzhan gyi yon tan sngon gyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su ma btang ba las skyes la / phyogs bcu'i 'dir zhes pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten te /
translated: They abide in those concentrations that arise gradually, and the qualities of other concentrations arise from not relinquishing the previous concentrations.üîΩIn the ten directions here means in the worlds of the ten directions.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It means in all world systems.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni sa bcu pa las rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa la sangs rgyas brgya la sogs pa mthong zhes gsungs pa nges par 'byung ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni sa bcu pa las rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa la sangs rgyas brgya la sogs pa mthong zhes gsungs pa nges par 'byung ba nyid kyis so //
translated: The word Buddha is used in the Dasabhumi Sutra, where it says, On the ground of joy and so on, one sees a hundred Buddhas and so on.

original: 'dir ni gdams pa po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang 'phags pa chos 'phags kyi mthus mos par spyod pa'i sa pas grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar gyur to //
analyzed: 'dir ni gdams pa po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang 'phags pa chos 'phags kyi mthus mos par spyod pa'i sa pas grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar gyur to //
translated: Here, by the power of the Tathagata's blessing and the noble Avalokitesvara, one who is on the stage of devoted interest sees countless Tathagatas.

original: 'gro ba zhes pa ni 'gro ba ni khong khro ba med pa des thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba zhes pa ni 'gro ba ni khong khro ba med pa des thob pa'o //
translated: The word going means that one attains the absence of anger.

original: bslabs pa ni bslab pa rnams thob pa'o //
analyzed: bslabs pa ni bslab pa rnams thob pa'o //
translated: Training means attaining the trainings.

original: de'i byas pa ni gang nyid sngon des byas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i byas pa ni gang nyid sngon des byas pa'o //
translated: What he did means what he did in the past.

original: gsung bar bya ba ni sems kyis dran par bya'o //
analyzed: gsung bar bya ba ni sems kyis dran par bya'o //
translated: What is to be said means what is to be remembered.

original: na bza' ni gos so //
analyzed: na bza' ni gos so //
translated: Clothes means garments.

original: de'i gdung ba ni mgo rdebs pa'o zhes pa'i don to //üîΩmi dga' ba ni mya ngan gyis so //
analyzed: de'i gdung ba ni mgo rdebs pa'o zhes pa'i don to // mi dga' ba ni mya ngan gyis so //
translated: His fever means his headache.üîΩDispleasure means sorrow.

original: yongs su gdung ba ni yid mi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su gdung ba ni yid mi dga' ba'o //
translated: Torment means mental unhappiness.

original: mi g-yo ba nas brtsams nas zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa srid kyang rnam pa thams cad du ma lus pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sa la'o zhes pa ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug chos 'phags la mngon par shes pa lngar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba nas brtsams nas zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa srid kyang rnam pa thams cad du ma lus pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sa la'o zhes pa ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug chos 'phags la mngon par shes pa lngar bshad pa'o //
translated: Beginning with the unshakable, the superknowledges of the extinction of the outflows are possible, but not in all aspects and without exception until the stage of the Buddha.

original: dga' ba ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: Joy is desire.

original: mgu ba ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: mgu ba ni dga' ba'o //
translated: Delight is joy.

original: yon tan bzhin du legs par sems pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan bzhin du legs par sems pa'o //
translated: Faith is the good thought of the virtues as if they were one's own.

original: rnyog pa med pa ni dad pa'o //
analyzed: rnyog pa med pa ni dad pa'o //
translated: Purity is faith.

original: de'i yon tan rnams la ngo mtshar ba ni ri mor byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i yon tan rnams la ngo mtshar ba ni ri mor byed pa'o //
translated: Wonder at his virtues is respect.

original: mngon par dga' ba ni gus pa nyid do //
analyzed: mngon par dga' ba ni gus pa nyid do //
translated: Admiration is reverence.

original: des zhes pa ni bdag gi lus dus yun thung ngur btsongs pa'i rin gyis so //
analyzed: des zhes pa ni bdag gi lus dus yun thung ngur btsongs pa'i rin gyis so //
translated: By that means by the price of the sale of one's body for a short time.

original: mngon par shes pa yod par srid kyang de'i rin gyis chos nyan pa don du gnyer ba nyid ni mngon par shes pa la longs spyod pa'i dran pa dang bral ba'i phyir dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa rnams kyang chos tshol ba la so sor spro ba dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa yod par srid kyang de'i rin gyis chos nyan pa don du gnyer ba nyid ni mngon par shes pa la longs spyod pa'i dran pa dang bral ba'i phyir dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa rnams kyang chos tshol ba la so sor spro ba dang ldan pas so //
translated: Even if they have supernormal powers, they are not interested in listening to the Dharma for the price of those powers, because they are devoid of the recollection of the enjoyment of supernormal powers, and because the merchant's daughter and the others are individually enthusiastic about seeking the Dharma.

original: dga' ba'i sems zhes pa ni dga' ba des sems sbyangs pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba'i sems zhes pa ni dga' ba des sems sbyangs pa'o //
translated: The mind of joy is the purification of the mind by that joy.

original: de las nyis 'gyur du dga' bar @218b 'gyur ba'i phyir rab tu dga' ba'i sems so //
analyzed: de las nyis 'gyur du dga' bar @218b 'gyur ba'i phyir rab tu dga' ba'i sems so //
translated: The mind of supreme joy is the mind of joy that is doubled.

original: sbyin par bya ba zhes pa ni chos la mchod pa don nga gnyer bas bar chad du yang ma brtsis pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin par bya ba zhes pa ni chos la mchod pa don nga gnyer bas bar chad du yang ma brtsis pa'o //
translated: The object of giving is the worship of the Dharma, which is not considered an obstacle by those who seek the goal.

original: rgyu rnams kyis ni gnod pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu rnams kyis ni gnod pa'o //
translated: The causes are the injuries.

original: yon tan gyi rigs ni mi rnams dang thun mong gi yon tan la khyad par ni mi las shin tu 'das pa'i yon tan no //
analyzed: yon tan gyi rigs ni mi rnams dang thun mong gi yon tan la khyad par ni mi las shin tu 'das pa'i yon tan no //
translated: The type of virtue is the common virtues of humans, and the distinction is the virtue that is completely beyond humans.

original: bzod pa ni rang gi bya ba 'dod pa'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: bzod pa ni rang gi bya ba 'dod pa'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: Patience is also for the sake of one's own desired activity.

original: yul can ni de la ma zhen ba'o //
analyzed: yul can ni de la ma zhen ba'o //
translated: The subject is not attached to that.

original: spros pa ni spong ba can du'o //
analyzed: spros pa ni spong ba can du'o //
translated: Elaboration is to be abandoned.

original: skad cig dang thang cig la nye bar len pa ni nyin pa po rnams kyi dad pa'i bye brag go //
analyzed: skad cig dang thang cig la nye bar len pa ni nyin pa po rnams kyi dad pa'i bye brag go //
translated: The moment and the instant are the different parts of the day of those who have faith.

original: bla ma zhes pa ni bla ma'i rgyu mtshan no //
analyzed: bla ma zhes pa ni bla ma'i rgyu mtshan no //
translated: The guru is the reason for the guru.

original: rol mo ni rang bzhin gyi rol mo'i bye brag go //
analyzed: rol mo ni rang bzhin gyi rol mo'i bye brag go //
translated: Music is a particular kind of natural music.

original: rab tu mang ba ni bye brag mang po'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu mang ba ni bye brag mang po'i phyir ro //
translated: Very many is because of many differences.

original: rnyed par dka' ba ni don dam pa ste rgya chen po'i don to //
analyzed: rnyed par dka' ba ni don dam pa ste rgya chen po'i don to //
translated: Difficult to attain is the ultimate, which is the meaning of the vast.

original: chings ma bdun gyi mdud pa bdun la rang gi ming gi rgya rnams kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: chings ma bdun gyi mdud pa bdun la rang gi ming gi rgya rnams kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: The seven knots of the sevenfold enclosure are sealed with their own names.

original: thogs pas ni snyim pas so //
analyzed: thogs pas ni snyim pas so //
translated: With the hands means with the cupped hands.

original: gsal zhes pa ni khyad par lhan cig mthong ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: gsal zhes pa ni khyad par lhan cig mthong ba'i phyir te /
translated: Clear means because of seeing the special together.

original: byed pa ni lhan cig tu mtha' zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: byed pa ni lhan cig tu mtha' zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The action is the meaning of seeing together.

original: rtag par rab tu ngu ba nye bar mtshon pa'i le'u'o //
analyzed: rtag par rab tu ngu ba nye bar mtshon pa'i le'u'o //
translated: This is the chapter illustrating the constant weeping.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba pandi ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa las le'u sum cu pa'o /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba pandi ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa las le'u sum cu pa'o /
translated: The Moonlight of the Essential Points, a commentary on the noble Perfection of Wisdom in Eight Thousand Lines, was composed by the great pa·πá·∏çita AbhayƒÅkaragupta.

original: // / de skad ces smras pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
analyzed: // / de skad ces smras pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
translated: Having said this, etc.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rnam grangs rnams ni rgyu mtshan gyi dbye ba tha dad de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rnam grangs rnams ni rgyu mtshan gyi dbye ba tha dad de /
translated: The synonyms of emptiness are different in terms of their reasons.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha' dang de bzhin nyid chos mthun pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha' dang de bzhin nyid chos mthun pa nyid kyis so //
translated: The element of space is similar to space in terms of its suchness.

original: 'o na mtshan la sogs pas rnam par mdzes pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na mtshan la sogs pas rnam par mdzes pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Well, isn't the body that is beautiful with the major and minor marks a tathƒÅgata?

original: gsungs pa ma yin zhes te /
analyzed: gsungs pa ma yin zhes te /
translated: It is said, No.

original: de bzhin nyid la shin tu rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la shin tu rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
translated: The utterly pure suchness is a tathƒÅgata.

original: de ni de'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
analyzed: de ni de'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
translated: That is his essential body.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang dbyer med par gsungs nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang dbyer med par gsungs nas /
translated: Having said that it is inseparable from the tathƒÅgata,

original: shin tu dbyer med par bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: shin tu dbyer med par bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa ni /
translated: Now, wishing to teach the complete inseparability of the two, he says:

original: gang yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWhatever‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'di rnams kyi de bzhin nyid la sogs pa rnams dang chos thams cad de phung po dang khams la sogs pa rnams kyi gcig ces pa ni mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi de bzhin nyid la sogs pa rnams dang chos thams cad de phung po dang khams la sogs pa rnams kyi gcig ces pa ni mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: The suchness of these and all phenomena, that is, the aggregates, elements, and so forth, is ‚Äúone‚Äù in brief.

original: yang gcig ces pa ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: yang gcig ces pa ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Again‚Äù is the extensive explanation.

original: 'dir nyi ma gung gi dus ni de'i tshe 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir nyi ma gung gi dus ni de'i tshe 'ong ba'o //
translated: Here, the time of noon is when it comes.

original: mngon par chags pa zhes pa ni byed pa po stong pa ste zhes pa @219a * //
analyzed: mngon par chags pa zhes pa ni byed pa po stong pa ste zhes pa @219a * //
translated: ‚Äú Attachment‚Äù is the empty agent.

original: ni don gyis rtogs pa'i khyad par gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ni don gyis rtogs pa'i khyad par gyi phyir ro //
translated: This is understood by the special meaning.

original: chos kyi sku zhes pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i sku ste kun rdzob tu ni gzugs sku las 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i tha snyad med pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku zhes pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i sku ste kun rdzob tu ni gzugs sku las 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i tha snyad med pa'o //
translated: The dharmakƒÅya is the body of non-entityness. Conventionally, there is no convention of going and coming from the form body.

original: glang po'i tshogs zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: glang po'i tshogs zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: The verse beginning with ‚Äúthe herd of elephants‚Äù is the assembly.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa ni yang dag pa'i don to //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa ni yang dag pa'i don to //
translated: The complete is the perfect meaning.

original: brdzun du smra ba dang chos mthun pa ni slu ba po nyid pas so //
analyzed: brdzun du smra ba dang chos mthun pa ni slu ba po nyid pas so //
translated: The similarity to lying is that it is a deception.

original: 'di gsungs pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'di gsungs pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes pa ste /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: don yod pa ni sbyin par byed pa'i 'bras bu che ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: don yod pa ni sbyin par byed pa'i 'bras bu che ba'i phyir te /
translated: The existence of the object is the great result of the giving.

original: lus yongs su grub pa ni srid pa'i mchog 'dzin pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus yongs su grub pa ni srid pa'i mchog 'dzin pa nyid do //
translated: The perfection of the body is the grasping of the highest existence.

original: gang du yang 'gro ba med pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus su ste ;
analyzed: gang du yang 'gro ba med pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus su ste ;
translated: The non-going anywhere is at the time of nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa na /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa na /
translated: At the time of nirvana,

original: 'go ba ni gang du yang yod pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: 'go ba ni gang du yang yod pa ma yin pas so //
translated: there is no going anywhere.

original: sngon gyi spyod pa ni sngon gyi lam gyi gnas skabs kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi spyod pa ni sngon gyi lam gyi gnas skabs kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: The previous practice is the application of the roots of virtue of the accumulations of merit and knowledge of giving and so forth in the state of the path.

original: rgyu ni nye ba len pa'i rgyu ste snying rje chen po'i smon lam gyi tshogs kyi shugs kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rgyu ni nye ba len pa'i rgyu ste snying rje chen po'i smon lam gyi tshogs kyi shugs kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The cause is the substantial cause, which is the power of the accumulation of the prayers of great compassion.

original: rkyen ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: rkyen ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: The condition is the cooperative cause.

original: de ni 'dir gdul bar bya ba'i sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma ste /
analyzed: de ni 'dir gdul bar bya ba'i sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma ste /
translated: The roots of virtue of many sentient beings to be trained are the cause of the arising of the Buddha.

original: de gnyi ga'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs la ni dgu ste /
analyzed: de gnyi ga'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs la ni dgu ste /
translated: The collection of causes and conditions of both of those is ninefold.

original: de'i rgyas par bshad pa ni sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pas zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rgyas par bshad pa ni sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pas zhes pa ste /
translated: The extensive explanation of that is ‚Äúdue to the maturation of previous karma.‚Äù

original: sngon gyi dge ba la rjes su gnas pa khyad par du gyur pa rab kyi mthar son pas yongs su sgyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon gyi dge ba la rjes su gnas pa khyad par du gyur pa rab kyi mthar son pas yongs su sgyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the transformation of the special, ultimate abiding in previous virtue.

original: kha cig dag ni sgra ni nye bar len pa ni sgra'i rdul phra rab bo zhes so //
analyzed: kha cig dag ni sgra ni nye bar len pa ni sgra'i rdul phra rab bo zhes so //
translated: Some say that sound is the subtle particle of sound.

original: rlung gi rdul phra rab ces pa ni gzhan dag gi'o //
analyzed: rlung gi rdul phra rab ces pa ni gzhan dag gi'o //
translated: The subtle particle of wind is that of others.

original: pi wang ni rgyud dgus dkris pa can no //
analyzed: pi wang ni rgyud dgus dkris pa can no //
translated: The lute is one with nine strings.

original: nye ba'i sbra ni gtso bo ma yin pa'i rgyud la'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i sbra ni gtso bo ma yin pa'i rgyud la'o //
translated: The small drum is on the principal string.

original: rgyu med pa ma yin pa ni sgra'i'o //
analyzed: rgyu med pa ma yin pa ni sgra'i'o //
translated: Sound is not without a cause.

original: dkrogs pa ni kun du bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: dkrogs pa ni kun du bskyod pa'o //
translated: Shaken means moved.

original: sba bkong bar gyur ba ni grib ma yang med pa'o //
analyzed: sba bkong bar gyur ba ni grib ma yang med pa'o //
translated: The sound of the drum is not obscured by the sound of the lute.

original: slar yang the tshom mi 'jug go zhes pa ni the tshom spangs pas nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi mthong ba'i lam gyis rab tu spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs nas bdag nyid kyis mthong ba'i lam rtogs par gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: slar yang the tshom mi 'jug go zhes pa ni the tshom spangs pas nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi mthong ba'i lam gyis rab tu spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs nas bdag nyid kyis mthong ba'i lam rtogs par gsal bar bya'o //
translated: Again, he does not enter into doubt. This shows that, having abandoned the afflictions to be abandoned by the path of seeing, which are illustrated by the abandonment of doubt, he should make it clear that he has realized the path of seeing himself.

original: mngon par bkab ces pa ni de'i mdun du lus thams cad sa la phab pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par bkab ces pa ni de'i mdun du lus thams cad sa la phab pa'o //
translated: He is fully covered means that he has fallen with his whole body on the ground in front of him.

original: zhugs pa ni bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: zhugs pa ni bskyod pa'o //
translated: He is engaged means he is moving.

original: gang bdag ni gang du bdag rjes su bslabs pa ni rjes su byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang bdag ni gang du bdag rjes su bslabs pa ni rjes su byed pa'o //
translated: He is trained means he is following.

original: lha'i ni nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
analyzed: lha'i ni nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
translated: The gods means those who have arisen from space.

original: sems gzhan du gyur pa ni sa'i chag chag gis kha phyir @219b phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: sems gzhan du gyur pa ni sa'i chag chag gis kha phyir @219b phyogs pa'o //
translated: His mind has changed means he is facing outward with the sprinkling of the earth.

original: 'di snyam du ni so sor brtag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di snyam du ni so sor brtag pa'o //
translated: Thus means individually investigating.

original: glags pa ni go skabs so //
analyzed: glags pa ni go skabs so //
translated: Opportunity means occasion.

original: lhag par gnas pa ni mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par gnas pa ni mi byed pa'o //
translated: He does not abide means he does not act.

original: yongs su tshol ba ni rtsol ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su tshol ba ni rtsol ba'o //
translated: He thoroughly searches means he strives.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the sameness of all phenomena.

original: ji ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni de yang chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa de dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas so //
analyzed: ji ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni de yang chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa de dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas so //
translated: Just as all phenomena are the same in that they are the objective support of the dharmadhƒÅtu,üîΩso too is that objective support the same as all phenomena.

original: gang du chos rnams thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid rnams kyis dben pas 'dir de yang rang gi mtshan nyid rnams kyis dben pas so //
analyzed: gang du chos rnams thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid rnams kyis dben pas 'dir de yang rang gi mtshan nyid rnams kyis dben pas so //
translated: And just as all phenomena are void of their own marks, so too is that objective support void of its own mark.

original: gang chos rnams thams cad dben pa las mi g-yo bas te de'i yang dben pa las mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: gang chos rnams thams cad dben pa las mi g-yo bas te de'i yang dben pa las mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: And just as all phenomena do not move from voidness, so too does that objective support not move from voidness.

original: chos rnams thams cad cung zad rlom sems med pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir la de'i yang rlom sems med pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad cung zad rlom sems med pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir la de'i yang rlom sems med pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are without the slightest conceit, because they are without an intrinsic nature, and that objective support is also without conceit.

original: dben pa dang ni mi g-yo ba de la gang gis kyang khengs par byed pa med de /
analyzed: dben pa dang ni mi g-yo ba de la gang gis kyang khengs par byed pa med de /
translated: And in that voidness and non-movement, there is nothing at all that can be inflated.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: rang bzhin gyis dben pa ni bstan pa ste des de yang bstan pa nyid de /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dben pa ni bstan pa ste des de yang bstan pa nyid de /
translated: The teaching is void by nature, and by that teaching, that objective support is also taught.

original: de de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa'i chos rnams thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa'i chos rnams thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis med pa'i phyir te /
translated: All phenomena are of one taste with suchness, because they do not exist by their own intrinsic identity.

original: de bzhin nyid du de yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du de yang ngo //
translated: Suchness is also that.

original: mu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag la chos rnams thams cad la de med pa ste /
analyzed: mu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag la chos rnams thams cad la de med pa ste /
translated: The limits are the past and future limits, and all phenomena are not there,

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag med pa'i phyir te de'i phyir mu med pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag med pa'i phyir te de'i phyir mu med pa nyid do //
translated: because the past and future do not exist. Therefore they are without limits.

original: de bzhin nyid du de yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du de yang ngo //
translated: Suchness is also that.

original: don dam par chos thams cad la ngo bo nyid med pas de'i phyir skye bar 'gyur ba med pa'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin te /
analyzed: don dam par chos thams cad la ngo bo nyid med pas de'i phyir skye bar 'gyur ba med pa'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin te /
translated: In the ultimate truth, all phenomena are devoid of essence, and therefore they are like illusory persons who do not arise.

original: de'i phyir skye ba med pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir skye ba med pa ste /
translated: Therefore they are nonarisen.

original: de bzhin du de yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du de yang ngo //
translated: Suchness is also that.

original: 'gag pa med pa ni de med pa'i phyir la de bzhin du de yang ngo //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa ni de med pa'i phyir la de bzhin du de yang ngo //
translated: They are also unceasing because they do not exist.

original: nam mkha' mu med pa ni phyogs bcu dus gsum rnams su'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' mu med pa ni phyogs bcu dus gsum rnams su'o //
translated: Space is without limits in the ten directions and three times.

original: de ltar des phyogs bcu dus gsum pa'i chos rnams stong pa nyid du gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar des phyogs bcu dus gsum pa'i chos rnams stong pa nyid du gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it illuminates all phenomena of the ten directions and three times as emptiness.

original: phyogs bcu'i mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams ni mu med pa'i rgya mtsho rnams kyis gang zhing de bzhin nyid dang gang yang chos rnams thams cad kyi dang / gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams ni mu med pa'i rgya mtsho rnams kyis gang zhing de bzhin nyid dang gang yang chos rnams thams cad kyi dang / gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The infinite world systems of the ten directions are filled with infinite oceans, and the suchness of all phenomena and the perfection of wisdom are also infinite, because they are observed in the suchness of all phenomena.

original: ji ltar nam mkha' cung zad rnam par mi rtog ste ci yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' cung zad rnam par mi rtog ste ci yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as space is non-conceptual in the slightest, because it is nothing at all,

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir dang rnam par rtog pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i phyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir dang rnam par rtog pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i phyur ro //
translated: in the same way, the perfection of wisdom is non-conceptual, because it is without intrinsic nature and has gone beyond conceptualization.

original: nam mkha' bzhin du gzugs kyi phung po mu med pa nyid de /üîΩgang la @220a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du gzugs kyi phung po mu med pa nyid de /üîΩgang la @220a * //
translated: Just as space is infinite in the form aggregate,üîΩin the same way, the perfection of wisdom is infinite,üîΩbecause it is the suchness of all phenomena.

original: gzhan du gzugs med pa de la mu med pa'am snang ba med pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan du gzugs med pa de la mu med pa'am snang ba med pa ste /
translated: Otherwise, it is formless, limitless, or non-apparent.

original: de bzhin du de'i de bzhin nyid snang bar byed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mu med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i de bzhin nyid snang bar byed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mu med pa nyid do //
translated: In the same way, the perfection of wisdom that illuminates its suchness is limitless.üîΩJust as the ocean is limitless, the perfection of wisdom is to be known as limitless.

original: ji ltar rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid du rnam par shes pa de ltar sems can mtha' yas pa rnams kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid du rnam par shes pa de ltar sems can mtha' yas pa rnams kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang /
translated: In the same way, the limitless feelings, perceptions, volitional formations, and consciousness of infinite sentient beings,

original: rnam par shes pa dang / sa'i khams dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa yang bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang / sa'i khams dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa yang bshad par bya'o //
translated: and the limitless elements of earth, water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness should be explained.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po mu med pa nyid dang rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa dag gi khyad par gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po mu med pa nyid dang rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa dag gi khyad par gang zhe na /
translated: What is the difference between the limitless aggregate of consciousness and the limitless element of consciousness?

original: phung po dang khams kyi sgra dag gis sbyor ba byas pa'o //
analyzed: phung po dang khams kyi sgra dag gis sbyor ba byas pa'o //
translated: The terms ‚Äúaggregates‚Äù and ‚Äúconstituents‚Äù are used.

original: sems 'dzin pas chos te ting nge 'dzin la rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: sems 'dzin pas chos te ting nge 'dzin la rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: The term ‚Äúdharma‚Äù refers to the mind, and the vajra-like concentration is the concentration on the mind.

original: de la ni gang chos rnams thams cad mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: de la ni gang chos rnams thams cad mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: In it, all dharmas are sameness.

original: de bzhin du de la chos rnams thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du de la chos rnams thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas so //
translated: In the same way, all dharmas are sameness in it.

original: chos thams cad kun tu tha mi dad pa dbye bas tha mi dad pa ni 'byed pa po rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rnams med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: chos thams cad kun tu tha mi dad pa dbye bas tha mi dad pa ni 'byed pa po rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rnams med pa'i phyir te /
translated: All dharmas are undifferentiated, because there is no differentiation of their individual characteristics by those who differentiate.

original: de bzhin du de la yang tha dad pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de la yang tha dad pa med pa'o //
translated: In the same way, they are undifferentiated in it.

original: chos thams cad cung zad kyang dmigs su med de /
analyzed: chos thams cad cung zad kyang dmigs su med de /
translated: All dharmas are not apprehended in the least,

original: gzugs kyi phung po bems po'i phyir dang / lhag ma rnams kyang bdag nyid dang gzhan du 'dzin pa nyid du sbyor ba med pa'i phyir dang / dmigs pa yang med pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po bems po'i phyir dang / lhag ma rnams kyang bdag nyid dang gzhan du 'dzin pa nyid du sbyor ba med pa'i phyir dang / dmigs pa yang med pa ste /
translated: because the form aggregate is inert, and the remaining ones are not engaged in the apprehension of self and other, and there is no objective support,

original: 'dzin pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dzin pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no apprehender.

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dmigs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dmigs pa med pa ste /
translated: Likewise, the perfection of wisdom is also non-apprehensible,

original: dmigs par mi gyur ba'i phyir dang / de las ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir de rnams kyis de la yang nye bar dmigs pa med pa nyid de /
analyzed: dmigs par mi gyur ba'i phyir dang / de las ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir de rnams kyis de la yang nye bar dmigs pa med pa nyid de /
translated: because it is not apprehended and because it is essenceless. Therefore, it is also non-apprehensible by them.

original: kun rdzob tu ma brtags na nyams dga' ba'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ni tha dad du'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu ma brtags na nyams dga' ba'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ni tha dad du'o //
translated: The conventional is pleasant when unexamined, with apprehended object and apprehending subject distinct.

original: rnams par mi 'jigs pa ni gzhan la tshig rnams kyi ston pas te /
analyzed: rnams par mi 'jigs pa ni gzhan la tshig rnams kyi ston pas te /
translated: Fearlessness is for others, through the teaching of the words.

original: de ni de rnams kyis de'i phyir mi 'jigs pa ste /
analyzed: de ni de rnams kyis de'i phyir mi 'jigs pa ste /
translated: That is fearlessness for them, because of that.

original: de rnams mnyam pa nyid pas so //
analyzed: de rnams mnyam pa nyid pas so //
translated: Because of their sameness.

original: de bzhin du gang zhig gi dmigs pa thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gang zhig gi dmigs pa thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'o //
translated: Likewise, the perfection of wisdom is for anyone who has all the objects.

original: 'dod pa ni bya ba ste chos thams cad la ji ltar gang yang gang du yang skye bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'dod pa ni bya ba ste chos thams cad la ji ltar gang yang gang du yang skye bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: Desire is activity, in that nothing arises anywhere in any way with respect to any phenomenon.

original: kun rdzob tu 'di'i rkyen nyid tsam gyis 'di las 'di 'byung ba'i med na 'di mi 'byung ba ni re zhig pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po la /
analyzed: kun rdzob tu 'di'i rkyen nyid tsam gyis 'di las 'di 'byung ba'i med na 'di mi 'byung ba ni re zhig pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po la /
translated: In the conventional, this is the mere condition of that, and the non-existence of this is the non-existence of that, and the thing of cause and effect is for the time being.

original: don dam pa la ni 'di mi 'dod de /
analyzed: don dam pa la ni 'di mi 'dod de /
translated: In the ultimate, this is not accepted.

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @220b pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @220b pa yang ngo //
translated: Likewise, the perfection of wisdom is also.

original: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: Because all phenomena are free from conceptual elaborations and are inconceivable, the perfection of wisdom is also inconceivable.

original: rig par bya zhes pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa'i tshig rnams dang 'brel te /
analyzed: rig par bya zhes pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa'i tshig rnams dang 'brel te /
translated: The word should be known is connected with the words the sameness of all phenomena and so forth.

original: mthar gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthar gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it clarifies the end.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, etc.

original: gang zhig rim pa'i gang zhig rnam pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa des de ltar ting nge 'dzin sum cu skyes pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhig rim pa'i gang zhig rnam pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa des de ltar ting nge 'dzin sum cu skyes pa ste /
translated: By whom the perfection of wisdom was taught in all aspects, by that, the thirty concentrations arose.

original: de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yang de ltar bshad do //
analyzed: de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yang de ltar bshad do //
translated: Since all phenomena are the same, etc., concentration is explained in that way.

original: ji ltar 'di rnams kyi rnam pa ni bye brag 'di rnams kyi dngos po shes pa'i phyir na ji skad du bshad pa'i gzhi shes pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa de ji ltar na dmigs pa ni de nyid kyi gzhi dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: ji ltar 'di rnams kyi rnam pa ni bye brag 'di rnams kyi dngos po shes pa'i phyir na ji skad du bshad pa'i gzhi shes pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa de ji ltar na dmigs pa ni de nyid kyi gzhi dang ldan pas so //
translated: Since the aspects of these are the entities of these distinctions, they are called the knowledge of the bases as they are explained.

original: yang na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa nyid la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i phyir te ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: yang na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa nyid la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i phyir te ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces brjod do //
translated: Or, since they focus on the very object of observation of the sameness of all phenomena, etc., concentration is also called that.

original: dngos po la gnas nas rnam pa ji lta ba'i mtshan ma med pa la sogs pa brgya stong 'bum phrag gis sa dang po rtogs la /
analyzed: dngos po la gnas nas rnam pa ji lta ba'i mtshan ma med pa la sogs pa brgya stong 'bum phrag gis sa dang po rtogs la /
translated: Abiding in entity, through the aspects of the absence of signs, etc., one realizes the first ground through hundreds of thousands of hundreds of thousands.

original: ting nge 'dzin brgya stong thob ces pa'i sa bcu'i tshig ni 'di rnams kyis nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin brgya stong thob ces pa'i sa bcu'i tshig ni 'di rnams kyis nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: The words of the ten grounds such as one attains hundreds of thousands of concentrations are illustrated by these words.

original: cung zhig nges par brgya thob pa nyid la ma nges pa ni brgyad las mang bar gzhan yang rmi lam gyi gnas skabs bzhin du dus re bzhin du ting nge 'dzin so sor nang ngo zhes pa ni gzhan dag gi'o //üîΩchos 'phags kyis mtshon pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o /üîΩ// / de thob ma thag tu zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: ming ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa'o // rnam grangs 'dis kyang zhes pa ni rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byung tshul 'dis kyang ngo //
