translated: The domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons is not even a fraction of the domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons.üîΩThe domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons is not even a fraction of the domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons.üîΩThe domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons is not even a fraction of the domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons.

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rnams ni kun du 'od la rnam pa thams cad rnams yongs su dag pa mthar phyin par gang de rnams thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi yul rnams dang de la cig
analyzed: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rnams ni kun du 'od la rnam pa thams cad rnams yongs su dag pa mthar phyin par gang de rnams thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi yul rnams dang de la cig
translated: The domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons is not even a fraction of the domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons.üîΩThe domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons is not even a fraction of the domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons.üîΩThe domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons is not even a fraction of the domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons.üîΩThe domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons is not even a fraction of the domain of the tathagatas abiding in wisdom for one hundred thousand eons.

original: shos kyi yon tan mtha' dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang tha mi dad pa gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gnas pa'i mgon med pa'i 'gro ba rnams la rnam pa thams cad kyis snod ji lta ba la rgyun mi
analyzed: shos kyi yon tan mtha' dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang tha mi dad pa gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gnas pa'i mgon med pa'i 'gro ba rnams la rnam pa thams cad kyis snod ji lta ba la rgyun mi
translated: Since it is endowed with all the qualities of the buddhas and is not different from the dharmakaya of the tathagatas, it is the protector of all beings who are without a protector in the worlds of the ten directions.

original: 'chad pas nam mkha' ji srid du rab tu 'jug cing mgon du gyur te /üîΩsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams nyid kyis @227a * //
analyzed: 'chad pas nam mkha' ji srid du rab tu 'jug cing mgon du gyur te / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams nyid kyis @227a * //
translated: It is engaged in all aspects, without interruption, as long as space exists, and it is the protector.üîΩThe buddhas, the bhagavats,üîΩfrom each pore of the body of the buddhas, the bhagavats, who are the embodiment of the perfection of wisdom, the wisdom of the buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid kyi ba spu re re'i bu ga nas dpe byad dang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la sogs
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid kyi ba spu re re'i bu ga nas dpe byad dang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la sogs
translated: the marks of a great being, the signs of a great being, the strengths, the fearlessnesses, the unshared qualities of the buddhas, and so forth,

original: pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams kyis yongs su bcad pa'i mthu rnams mngon par 'dzin pa ni rang gi ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskal pa grangs med par tshe byin gyis brlabs nas de ltar myur ba myur bar phrin las gzhal med par
analyzed: pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams kyis yongs su bcad pa'i mthu rnams mngon par 'dzin pa ni rang gi ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskal pa grangs med par tshe byin gyis brlabs nas de ltar myur ba myur bar phrin las gzhal med par
translated: The power of the qualities of the buddhas is inconceivable, and by blessing their lives for countless eons, they are able to perform such inconceivable enlightened activities so quickly.

original: 'gyur bas / gal te mngon par brjod kyang de lta na yang yon tan yongs su rdzogs par mi nus na /üîΩsa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang snga nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ltar /
analyzed: 'gyur bas / gal te mngon par brjod kyang de lta na yang yon tan yongs su rdzogs par mi nus na / sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang snga nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ltar /
translated: Even if one were to speak for countless eons, one would not be able to fully express the qualities of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mthar thugs pa shes pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mthar thugs pa shes pa'am /
translated: The bodhisattvas on the tenth bhumi, the shravakas, and the pratyekabuddhas are unable to know the full extent of the qualities of the buddhas.

original: mngon par brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa gang 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni bdag cag ma rig pa'i rab rib kyi mun par gyur pa ji lta ba rnams shin tu lkog tu 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mngon par brjod pa'i skabs suüîΩji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa gang 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni bdag cag ma rig pa'i rab rib kyi mun par gyur pa ji lta ba rnams shin tu lkog tu 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mngon par brjod pa'i skabs su ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Since the characteristics of these qualities are extremely hidden to us who are shrouded in the darkness of the mist of ignorance, how could we possibly describe them?

original: de lta na yang 'phags pa klu sgrub la sogs pa la brten nas the tshom bzlog pas bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mthu'i yon tan phyogs gcig gi zhad tsam mngon par
analyzed: de lta na yang 'phags pa klu sgrub la sogs pa la brten nas the tshom bzlog pas bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mthu'i yon tan phyogs gcig gi zhad tsam mngon par
translated: Nevertheless, we will briefly describe some of the qualities of the power of the Tathagata's wisdom paramita, based on the teachings of the noble Nagarjuna and others, in order to clear away the doubts of those who think that the Tathagata does not exist.

original: brjod kyang / byis pa rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan gyis dbul zhing mos pas bcom pas thos kyang de lta bu'i yon tan kun tu 'phel ba la blos ma mos la de'i chos la mkhas pa rnams kyis ni yang rkang dang dpyi la zhes pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes
analyzed: brjod kyang / byis pa rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan gyis dbul zhing mos pas bcom pas thos kyang de lta bu'i yon tan kun tu 'phel ba la blos ma mos la de'i chos la mkhas pa rnams kyis ni yang rkang dang dpyi la zhes pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes
translated: children, being naturally poor in good qualities and destroyed by devotion, do not mentally aspire to increase such good qualities even though they hear about them.

original: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de'i ngo bo rnams dang de'i rgyu'i ngo bo dang de gnyi ga'i mngon par brjod pa po la mngon par rab tu brten par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de'i ngo bo rnams dang de'i rgyu'i ngo bo dang de gnyi ga'i mngon par brjod pa po la mngon par rab tu brten par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those skilled in their Dharma fully rely on the Blessed Lady Praj√±ƒÅpƒÅramitƒÅ, her essence, the essence of her cause, and the one who expresses both of those.

original: de la phan pa ni des dad pa tsam dang yang mngon par rab tu ldan na ma nges pa'i rnam par smin pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnams kyi phung po myong bar mi 'gyur zhing lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa rjes su myong bar
analyzed: de la phan pa ni des dad pa tsam dang yang mngon par rab tu ldan na ma nges pa'i rnam par smin pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnams kyi phung po myong bar mi 'gyur zhing lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa rjes su myong bar
translated: There, benefit is that if one is endowed with mere faith in her, the mass of misdeeds with uncertain ripening will not be experienced and one will experience the excellence of gods and humans.

original: gyur nas de'i rjes la dngos po dang dngos po med pa la mngon par zhen pa'i rtsa ba can gyi phyir ma lus pa'i nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rab tu 'byung ba'i de'i gnyen por gyur pa gcig pa nyidüîΩkyis @227b * //üîΩlegs pa'i grong khyer du rab tu 'jug cing gnas par byed pa ji skad du bshad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed pa 'di nyid du don du gnyer ba rnams kyi ring du spang bar byas pa ni ma lus pa'i lam ngan
analyzed: gyur nas de'i rjes la dngos po dang dngos po med pa la mngon par zhen pa'i rtsa ba can gyi phyir ma lus pa'i nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rab tu 'byung ba'i de'i gnyen por gyur pa gcig pa nyid kyis @227b * // legs pa'i grong khyer du rab tu 'jug cing gnas par byed pa ji skad du bshad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed pa 'di nyid du don du gnyer ba rnams kyi ring du spang bar byas pa ni ma lus pa'i lam ngan
translated: Having become that, after that, the collection of the afflictions, karma, and birth, which is the affliction, arises from the root of the adherence to things and nonthings.üîΩThe antidote to that is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom, as it has been explained, which is the entrance and the abode in the city of goodness.

original: pa la dka' ba'i rnam par rtog pa la dga' ba'o //
analyzed: pa la dka' ba'i rnam par rtog pa la dga' ba'o //
translated: Those who seek this very thing should abandon far away the delight in the difficult conceptualization of the path of the entire bad path.

original: de ltar lung dang rigs pa rnams kyi sgron mas gsal bar byas pa ni gang zhig bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis gsal bar byas pa'i phyir dang / ma lus pa'i skye bo rnams kyi ded dpon dpa' bo rnams gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar lung dang rigs pa rnams kyi sgron mas gsal bar byas pa ni gang zhig bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis gsal bar byas pa'i phyir dang / ma lus pa'i skye bo rnams kyi ded dpon dpa' bo rnams gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, since it has been illuminated by the lamps of scripture and reasoning, and since it is the path traversed and followed by the great beings and the heroic guides of all beings,

original: de nyid bdag nyid kyis nges par ston par 'dod pa rnams kyis blo dam pa mkhas pa las nges par byas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od la thos pa dang bsam pa dag la mchog tu gus pa'i gnas su byas nas gus pa dang
analyzed: de nyid bdag nyid kyis nges par ston par 'dod pa rnams kyis blo dam pa mkhas pa las nges par byas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od la thos pa dang bsam pa dag la mchog tu gus pa'i gnas su byas nas gus pa dang
translated: those who wish to teach it themselves should rely on the Candrapradƒ´pa S≈´tra of the Bhagavatƒ´, which is the supreme object of study and reflection for those who have the highest intelligence and skill.

original: bcas pa yun ring por ma bral zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas tshogs la sogs pa'i sa non nas rim gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu son nas kun du gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcas pa yun ring por ma bral zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas tshogs la sogs pa'i sa non nas rim gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu son nas kun du gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: With respect, they should not be separated from it for a long time, and by meditating on the perfection of wisdom, they should traverse the stages of accumulation and so on, and in stages they will reach the perfection of unsurpassed enlightenment and abide there.

original: de skad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde rin po che gsungs pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de skad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde rin po che gsungs pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Thus means possessing the teaching of the precious Perfection of Wisdom S≈´tra.

original: ston pa pos bla na med pa'i chos bstan pas dga' bar gyur nas nyan pa pos kyang gsungs pa la mngon par bstod pa'o //
analyzed: ston pa pos bla na med pa'i chos bstan pas dga' bar gyur nas nyan pa pos kyang gsungs pa la mngon par bstod pa'o //
translated: The teacher, having rejoiced in the teaching of the unsurpassed Dharma, the listeners also praise the teaching.

original: 'jig rten ni tshogs te byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa dang lha la sogs pa dang bcas pa ni 'jig rten zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten ni tshogs te byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa dang lha la sogs pa dang bcas pa ni 'jig rten zhes pa'o //
translated: The world is the assembly, consisting of Bodhisattvas and so on, and gods and so on, it is called the world.

analyzed: yongs su gtad pa'i mngon par brjod pa'i le'u'o //
translated: This is the chapter on the declaration of entrustment.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba pandi ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o /
